nodes.text: Brooks Propulsion Devices (BPD) was a company that specialized in propulsion systems for astromech droids, notably anti-grav booster components for Industrial Automaton R-series droids.
Brooks Propulsion Devices was shut down by the Galactic Empire following the Clone Wars.
Brooks was named for Billy Brooks, a CGI artist that was responsible for R2-D2's flight in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.[source?]
